short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Create events like click button, input text, wait a while, or repeat steps. Events Series can do repetitive tasks accurately.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Automaton can click/input on your page and wait-for/repeat those tasks.

Four buttons:
Execute: Start running the Automaton.
Save: Save the current Automaton.
Clear: Remove all actions from Automaton.
Add Action: Append a new specified action.

Five actions:
Click, Input, Wait, Goto, Break
